content:
RetryExponential RetryExponential Class

In this Article

Edit

Represents a retry policy that performs a specified number of retries, using a randomized exponential backoff scheme to determine the interval between retries.

Syntax

Declaration

public sealed class RetryExponential : RetryPolicyPublic NotInheritable Class RetryExponential
    Inherits RetryPolicy
